name: Neonskip
description:
Neonskip is a very simple and entertaining game, which involves avoiding falling obstacles above a triangle, using the navigation arrows.

Also, you can upload your score to compete with friends and the rest of the world. The game has 8 levels and very addictive gameplay!

This indie game was developed by Eam Games! Neonskip was developed nothing less than to entertain players, and is completely free!

The game is totally FREE, if you want to help me grow, you can donate (:

Neonskip is a simple game, wich you must avoid the falling rectangles, using the left and right arrows. Language are only available in spanish, sorry for this!

You can see story, and more details in Wikipedia: https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Neonskip

Like us in Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Neonskip

Available on Desura (8/10 scored): http://www.desura.com/games/neonskip
